  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/KwasiKwarteng">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Philip Hammond Retweeted HM Treasury</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">We can be proud of 5 years of sustained growth and record employment. 

But we are not complacent, so we are investing billions in transport, housing, digital connectivity and skills to build an economy fit for the future.<a href="https://t.co/U6Xjiyhb8P" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/hmtreasury/status/956824981715013633" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/hmtreasury/status/956824981715013633"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/hmtreasury/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/956824981715013633</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Philip Hammond added,</p>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">New <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GDP</b></span> statistics show the UK economy grew 1.8% in 2017. 

Find out what GDP means and why it is important <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f447.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Hand from back with index finger pointing down" aria-label="Emoji: Hand from back with index finger pointing down" /> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/zyV2IBQfnm</span></div>

I hope the NHS will review its policy on not funding relapses. It seems very harsh to only fund treatment the first time, but not for subsequent relapses</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Real household incomes up 600 last year. We are supporting families by cutting taxes and boosting wages as we build an economy fit for the future.<a href="https://t.co/rtgZNi2nKg" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ONS/status/951025032402292736" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ONS/status/951025032402292736"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ONS/status/951</span><span class="invisible">025032402292736</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Philip Hammond Retweeted Bank of England</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Our economy is strong and resilient, supported by independent monetary policy and stable prices from the Bank of England. 1/2<a href="https://t.co/Lzy6cpUklM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/bankofengland/status/926056332893007872" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/bankofengland/status/926056332893007872"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/bankofengland/</span><span class="invisible">status/926056332893007872</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">UK stands united w/ US friends following the horrific <a href="/hashtag/NYC?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NYC</b></a> attack.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kwasi Kwarteng MP Retweeted SBF</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I was very happy to open the <a href="/hashtag/SpelthorneSkillsandCareersFair?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SpelthorneSkillsandCareersFair</b></a> this morning<a href="https://t.co/ESbJsaaBgR" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/sbf_spelthorne/status/910785824920342528" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/sbf_spelthorne/status/910785824920342528"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/sbf_spelthorne</span><span class="invisible">/status/910785824920342528</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kwasi Kwarteng MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

      </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kwasi Kwarteng MP Retweeted BBC Parliament</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Honoured to be invited to second the Loyal Address<a href="https://t.co/5SM75QKXkP" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/BBCParliament/status/877524473515266049" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/BBCParliament/status/877524473515266049"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/BBCParliament/</span><span class="invisible">status/877524473515266049</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kwasi Kwarteng MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="875767646293295104" data-item-id="875767646293295104" data-permalink-path="/KwasiKwarteng/status/875767646293295104" data-conversation-id="875767646293295104" data-tweet-nonce="875767646293295104-9185769d-e525-4d5d-bc9f-54884bc3a6db" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="KwasiKwarteng" data-name="Kwasi Kwarteng MP" data-user-id="707967655031005186" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="rlionshepperton" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;707967655031005186&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;KwasiKwarteng&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Kwasi Kwarteng MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Kwasi Kwarteng MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Kwasi Kwarteng MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;2461794822&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;rlionshepperton&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Red Lion Shepperton&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Red Lion Shepperton&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Red Lion Shepperton&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/KwasiKwarteng" data-user-id="707967655031005186">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/707971877847875592/lM-iYQDX_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">Kwasi Kwarteng MP</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>KwasiKwarteng</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">
  <a href="/KwasiKwarteng/status/875767646293295104" class="tweet-timestamp js-permalink js-nav js-tooltip" title="10:30 am - 16 Jun 2017" data-conversation-id="875767646293295104"><span class="_timestamp js-short-timestamp " data-aria-label-part="last" data-time="1497634252" data-time-ms="1497634252000" data-long-form="true">16 Jun 2017</span></a>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kwasi Kwarteng MP Retweeted HEINEKEN UK News</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Had a great visit today at <a href="/rlionshepperton" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2461794822"><s>@</s><b>rlionshepperton</b></a><a href="https://t.co/kyHMA9UE9d" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/heinekenUK_News/status/875722578643611649" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/heinekenUK_News/status/875722578643611649"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/heinekenUK_New</span><span class="invisible">s/status/875722578643611649</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Surrey News Retweeted Staines fire station</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thank you to everyone that donated. <a href="/SurreyFRS" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="194111413"><s>@</s><b>SurreyFRS</b></a> stations are no longer taking any donations. If you want to help try: <a href="https://t.co/psHX7FuSJs" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://thekandcfoundation.com/" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://thekandcfoundation.com/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">thekandcfoundation.com</span><span class="invisible">/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/FEE60p0klX" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/StainesFire/status/875281396557893633" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/StainesFire/status/875281396557893633"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/StainesFire/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/875281396557893633</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Surrey News added,</p>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kwasi Kwarteng MP Retweeted Get Surrey</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Honoured to be re-elected as MP for Spelthorne. I would like to thank everyone who made this happen.<a href="https://t.co/RjvRy47776" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/getsurrey/status/873083493437370368" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/getsurrey/status/873083493437370368"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/getsurrey/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/873083493437370368</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Leo Docherty MP Retweeted UK Prime Minister</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Statement from the PM - calm vigilance is the order of the day<a href="https://t.co/mU9hOkYZbc" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/number10gov/status/866985839502385152" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/number10gov/status/866985839502385152"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/number10gov/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/866985839502385152</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Leo Docherty MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="866985839502385152" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="10DowningStreet" data-user-id="14224719" href="/10DowningStreet/status/866985839502385152" data-conversation-id="866985839502385152" tabindex="0">

            <div class="QuoteMedia">

        <div class="AdaptiveMedia-badgeText">8:19</div>

      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">8</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">8</span>

</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I've been in contact with Shepperton &amp; Sunbury Medical Practices about the unfair service charge they're facing. I will do all I can to help</p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I think a deal can be reached between the UK and EU, and there is no reason why it can't be amicable, friendly and mutually beneficial<a href="https://t.co/5294ko96Nz" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/bbcworldservice/status/847179235504607236" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/bbcworldservice/status/847179235504607236"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/bbcworldservic</span><span class="invisible">e/status/847179235504607236</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kwasi Kwarteng MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Britain is on the road to <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></span>. Opinions are divided.
More here from @KwasiKwartengMP and <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="326184301"><s>@</s><b>Anna_Soubry</b></span> : <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bbc.in/2nhHVNz" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bbc.in/2nhHVNz"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.in/2nhHVNz</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/gAzMLEJdYr</span></div>

</div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">33</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>

    </div>

      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">107</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kwasi Kwarteng MP Retweeted Hampton School</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I was very pleased to address engaged pupils from <a href="/HamptonSchool" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="304916430"><s>@</s><b>HamptonSchool</b></a><a href="https://t.co/A0yydhFMaF" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/HamptonSchool/status/818790422906601472" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/HamptonSchool/status/818790422906601472"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/HamptonSchool/</span><span class="invisible">status/818790422906601472</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

</div>
  



      
      

      

      

    </div>

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">More good news <a href="https://t.co/FTCj6wuTOQ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.ft.com/content/84595294-c79a-11e6-9043-7e34c07b46ef?ftcamp=published_links%2Frss%2Fhome_uk%2Ffeed%2F%2Fproduct" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.ft.com/content/84595294-c79a-11e6-9043-7e34c07b46ef?ftcamp=published_links%2Frss%2Fhome_uk%2Ffeed%2F%2Fproduct"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">ft.com/content/845952</span><span class="invisible">94-c79a-11e6-9043-7e34c07b46ef?ftcamp=published_links%2Frss%2Fhome_uk%2Ffeed%2F%2Fproduct</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> via <a href="/FT" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18949452"><s>@</s><b>FT</b></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kwasi Kwarteng MP Retweeted CMEC</p>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>

  </ul>
</div>

  </div>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

</div>
  



      
      

      

      

    </div>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="793076972507234308" data-item-id="793076972507234308" data-permalink-path="/KwasiKwarteng/status/793076972507234308" data-conversation-id="793076972507234308" data-tweet-nonce="793076972507234308-a566f274-2b7d-4887-a6ea-54d1e7a0470a" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="KwasiKwarteng" data-name="Kwasi Kwarteng MP" data-user-id="707967655031005186" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="CommonsPAC" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;707967655031005186&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;KwasiKwarteng&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Kwasi Kwarteng MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Kwasi Kwarteng MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Kwasi Kwarteng MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;986487872&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;CommonsPAC&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Public Accounts Comm&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Public Accounts Comm&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Public Accounts Comm&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/KwasiKwarteng" data-user-id="707967655031005186">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/707971877847875592/lM-iYQDX_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Positive news about the economy <a href="/hashtag/economicgrowth?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>economicgrowth</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/ukeconomy?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ukeconomy</b></a><a href="https://t.co/gc8iOTqjfl" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/FinancialTimes/status/791562428463124480" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/FinancialTimes/status/791562428463124480"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/FinancialTimes</span><span class="invisible">/status/791562428463124480</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Pleased to speak with <a href="/CMECnews" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="275068642"><s>@</s><b>CMECnews</b></a> after this morning's debate on Libya <a href="/hashtag/Libya?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Libya</b></a><a href="https://t.co/E2ejIpLGFb" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/CMECnews/status/791240214249402368" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/CMECnews/status/791240214249402368"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/CMECnews/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/791240214249402368</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  </div>
</div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="789444434358337536" id="stream-item-tweet-789444434358337536" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;789444434358337536&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kwasi Kwarteng MP Retweeted Peston on Sunday</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Im looking forward to the discussion on Sunday <a href="/hashtag/Peston?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Peston</b></a><a href="https://t.co/V0hbz2Qfd0" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/pestononsunday/status/789441762179837952" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/pestononsunday/status/789441762179837952"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/pestononsunday</span><span class="invisible">/status/789441762179837952</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="788998185217777665" data-item-id="788998185217777665" data-permalink-path="/Conservatives/status/788998185217777665" data-conversation-id="788998185217777665" data-tweet-nonce="788998185217777665-8c94b505-58af-441a-bb34-b98ddf4083dd" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="789017478307442688" data-retweeter="KwasiKwarteng" data-screen-name="Conservatives" data-name="Conservatives" data-user-id="14281853" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;14281853&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;Conservatives&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Conservatives&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Conservatives&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Conservatives&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;707967655031005186&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;KwasiKwarteng&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Kwasi Kwarteng MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Kwasi Kwarteng MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Kwasi Kwarteng MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">talkRADIO</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>talkRADIO</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">BBC Daily Politics and Sunday Politics</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>daily_politics</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Looking at Conservative policy announcements with @KwasiKwartengMP <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19644592"><s>@</s><b>campbellclaret</b></span> on <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>bbcdp</b></span> <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bbc.in/2dAXc9z" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bbc.in/2dAXc9z"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.in/2dAXc9z</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kwasi Kwarteng MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/CMECnews/status/782970718883569665" data-conversation-id="782970718883569665" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="782970718883569665" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="CMECnews" data-user-id="275068642" href="/CMECnews/status/782970718883569665" data-conversation-id="782970718883569665" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kwasi Kwarteng MP Retweeted BBC Free Thinking</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Listen to my recent discussion at Radio 3's pop-up studio at London's Southbank Centre
<a href="https://t.co/BRC0a6WVPw" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b07wrllc" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b07wrllc"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/programmes/b07</span><span class="invisible">wrllc</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/IJ2EFYuqpX" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/BBCFreeThinking/status/781473605087469568" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/BBCFreeThinking/status/781473605087469568"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/BBCFreeThinkin</span><span class="invisible">g/status/781473605087469568</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kwasi Kwarteng MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/BBCFreeThinking/status/781473605087469568" data-conversation-id="781473605087469568" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="781473605087469568" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="BBCFreeThinking" data-user-id="268241662" href="/BBCFreeThinking/status/781473605087469568" data-conversation-id="781473605087469568" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">History Author Show</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>HistoryDean</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">.@KwasiKwartengMP reviews <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="102410279"><s>@</s><b>Candice_Millard</b></span>'s HERO OF THE EMPIRE on Churchill <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.theguardian.com/books/2016/sep/21/hero-of-the-empire-the-making-of-winston-churchill-by-candice-millard-review" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.theguardian.com/books/2016/sep/21/hero-of-the-empire-the-making-of-winston-churchill-by-candice-millard-review"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">theguardian.com/books/2016/sep</span><span class="invisible">/21/hero-of-the-empire-the-making-of-winston-churchill-by-candice-millard-review</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span> <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="30450231"><s>@</s><b>ChurchillCentre</b></span>  <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="26533046"><s>@</s><b>DoubleDayBooks</b></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/v2aftLPQ5F</span></div>

    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="778904360956887040" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="CMECnews" data-user-id="275068642" href="/CMECnews/status/778904360956887040" data-conversation-id="778904360956887040" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">CMEC</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>CMECnews</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">CMEC <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Britain</b></span> after <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></span> continues today with an exclusive article from @KwasiKwartengMP be the first to read it:

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kwasi Kwarteng MP Retweeted Reuters Top News</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Hopefully all sides will honour the ceasefire reached at the weekend. <a href="/hashtag/syria?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>syria</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/Syriaceasefire?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Syriaceasefire</b></a><a href="https://t.co/1D6epi8MQt" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Reuters/status/775311170249035776" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Reuters/status/775311170249035776"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Reuters/status</span><span class="invisible">/775311170249035776</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kwasi Kwarteng MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Reuters/status/775311170249035776" data-conversation-id="775311170249035776" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="775311170249035776" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Reuters" data-user-id="1652541" href="/Reuters/status/775311170249035776" data-conversation-id="775311170249035776" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Reuters Top News</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Reuters</b></span>
  </div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Reply</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">45</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I would like to give my full support to <a href="/SpelthorneZone" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="741272143321804800"><s>@</s><b>SpelthorneZone</b></a>, the campaign to get Spelthorne's train stations into Zone 6 <a href="/hashtag/spelthorneinthezone?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>spelthorneinthezone</b></a></p>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/KwasiKwarteng" data-user-id="707967655031005186">

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Read my opinion on the <a href="/MayorofLondon" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14700117"><s>@</s><b>MayorofLondon</b></a>'s journey to lead the <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a>:<a href="https://t.co/yq66oQPHRU" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.standard.co.uk/comment/comment/kwasi-kwarteng-can-any-other-tory-deliver-the-knockout-blow-to-boris-johnson-a3231441.html" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.standard.co.uk/comment/comment/kwasi-kwarteng-can-any-other-tory-deliver-the-knockout-blow-to-boris-johnson-a3231441.html"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">standard.co.uk/comment/commen</span><span class="invisible">t/kwasi-kwarteng-can-any-other-tory-deliver-the-knockout-blow-to-boris-johnson-a3231441.html</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
